charges.charge_description: CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE 21:846 and 841(b)(1)(C) Defendants conspire amongst themselves and others to distribute cocaine and cocaine base.
CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE NARCOTICS 21:846 and 841(b)(1)(A) and 841(b)(1)(C)Conspiracy to Distribute Cocaine base aka crack(1s)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced 120 months imprisonment, followed by 60 months on supervised release. $100 CVF Assessment.

charges.charge_description: 21:846, 841(b)(1)(A) and 841(b)(1)(C)CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE CONTROLLED SUBSTANCES (cocaine and cocaine base "crack")(1)
21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(B) and 18:2 CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE - Distribution of Controlled Substance (cocaine base "crack")(2)
NARCOTICS - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE 21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(B) and 18:2 Distribution of a Cocaine base aka crack(2s)
CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE 21:846 and 841(b)(1)(C) Defendants conspire amongst themselves and others to distribute cocaine and cocaine base.
21:846, 841(b)(1)(A) and 841(b)(1)(C)CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE CONTROLLED SUBSTANCES (cocaine and cocaine base "crack")(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant committed to the custody of the US BOP to be imprisoned for a term of 66 months. Supervised release - 5 years. JUDGMENT FOR REVOCATION OF SUPERVISED RELEASE entered on July 19, 2013. Defendant committed to the custody of the US BOP to be imprisoned for a term of 24 months. Supervised Release - 18 months. 6/27/16 SR REVOKED - Defendant is sentenced to the custody of the BOP for a term of 24 months. Upon release, Defendant shall serve a supervised release term of 36 months.

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(B) and 18:2 CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE - Distribution of a Controlled Substance (cocaine base "crack")(2)

charges.charge_disposition: Dismissed at the time of sentencing upon motion of the government.
